nodes.text: The Quake Shelter 14-K was a groundquake shelter located on the Frinn Mesa of Makeb. During the Conquest of Makeb it was taken over by the InterStellar Regulators and was used by Kazac to hold their captive Lemda Avesta.
Quake Shelter 14-K appears as an area on Makeb in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion.
